messages.content: what is the price of personal loan?

The price of a Personal Loan starts from 10,000 INR onwards. It offers flexible repayment options with competitive interest rates. If you are interested in exploring more details or have any specific questions about the Personal Loan, feel free to ask!

📚 *Source: finance_company_pricing.pdf*
what is the process of filling the application form?

✨ Our loan application process is simple: 1) Fill online application 2) Submit documents 3) Get instant approval 4) Receive funds in 24-48 hours. You can start your application by calling us or visiting our website.

📚 *Source: Company Process Guide*
